author: senh
title: The country that embodies optimism
text: BING NEWS: Film review: Brie Larson and prodigy star Jacob Tremblay illuminate the darkness of 'Room' He brings delightful innocence and profound depth to the curious boy at the heart of "Room." He is the light to the darkness of Ma, which Larson embodies with heartbreaking truth. If Jack is the hope in "Room," Ma is the heart.
